Package imagingbook.lib.math

Class Complex

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.lib.math.Complex
  • public class Complex
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents complex numbers. Instances are immutable. Methods are mostly defined to be compatible with org.apache.commons.math3.complex.Complex and (newer) org.apache.commons.numbers.complex.Complex. Arithmetic operations are generally more precise than with the Apache implementation.
    Version:
    2020/11/20

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static Complex I
      Imaginary unit value (z = 0 + i 1).
      double im
      The imaginary part of this complex number
      static Complex ONE
      Real unit value (z = 1 + i 0).
      double re
      The real part of this complex number
      static Complex ZERO
      Complex zero value (z = 0 + i 0).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Complex​(double phi)
      Create a complex quantity on the unit circle with angle 'phi': e^{\i \phi} = \cos(\phi) + \i \cdot \sin(\phi)
      Complex​(double re, double im)
      Constructor.
      Complex​(Complex z)
      Constructor
      Complex​(Pnt2d pnt)  

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      double abs()
      Returns the absolute value of this complex number, i.e., its radius or distance from the origin.
      double abs2()
      Returns the squared absolute value of this complex number, i.e., its squared radius or distance from the origin.
      Complex add​(Complex z)
      Adds a complex quantity to this complex number and returns a new complex number.
      double arg()
      Returns the 'argument' of this complex number, i.e., its angle relative to the real axis.
      Complex conjugate()
      Returns the conjugate z* of this complex number, i.e, if z = a + i b then z* = a - i b.
      boolean equals​(double a, double b)  
      boolean equals​(java.lang.Object o)  
      double getIm()
      Returns the imaginary part of this complex number.
      double getRe()
      Returns the real part of this complex number.
      boolean isNaN()
      Returns true if the real or imaginary component of this complex number is NaN.
      Complex multiply​(double s)
      Multiplies this complex number with the scalar factor s and returns a new complex number.
      Complex multiply​(Complex z2)
      Multiplies this complex number with another complex quantity z2 and returns a new complex number.
      Complex pow​(int k)
      Returns of value of this complex number raised to the power of k.
      Complex rotate​(double phi)
      Rotates this complex number by the angle phi and returns a new complex number.
      double[] toArray()
      Returns a 2-element array with the real and imaginary part of this complex number.
      java.lang.String toString()
